Bunny Tooth.Name: Bunny Tooth
Bunny Tooth.Description: The Tooth of a Bunny. Can probably be sold in the Guild for a pittance.

Wolf Claws.Name: Wolf Claws
Wolf Claws.Description: Claws of a Wolf. Can probably be sold in the guild for a pittance.

Torch.Name: Torch
Torch.Description: A simple wooden Torch. Will probably last a few hours.

Lantern.Name: Lantern
Lantern.Description: A simple hooded oil Lantern. Will probably last a day or two

Burnt Lantern.Name: Burnt Lantern
Burnt Lantern.Description: A simple hooded oil Lantern. This one has run out of fuel, but can be refilled with some lantern oil.

Lantern Oil.Name: Lantern Oil
Lantern Oil.Description: Can be used to refill simple oil Lanterns

Goblin Ear.Name: Goblin Ear
Goblin Ear.Description: The ear of a Goblin. Can be turned in at the Guild for a bounty.

Direwolf Claws.Name: Direwolf Claws
Direwolf Claws.Description: The claws of a Direwolf. A meaner and bigger ancestor of normal wolfs. Can be turned in at the Guild for a bounty.

Mana Lantern.Name: Mana Lantern
Mana Lantern.Description: A Magical versioin of a normal Lantern. It draws fuel from the ambient Mana.

Dead Mana Lantern.Name: Dead Mana Lantern
Dead Mana Lantern.Description: A Mana Lantern that ran out of fuel. Most mages should be able to relight it.

Orc Tusks.Name: Orc Tusks
Orc Tusks.Description: The tusk of an Orc. Can be turned in at the Guild for a bounty.

Iron Ore.Name: Iron Ore
Iron Ore.Description: A standard Chunk of Iron ore. A Blacksmith would probably be happy to buy it.

Copper Ore.Name: Copper Ore
Copper Ore.Description: A normal Chunk of Copper ore A Blacksmith would probably be happy to buy it.

Iron Shortword.Name: Iron Shortword
Iron Shortword.Description: A normal sword made of medium quality iron. Often used by begginers who can't afford better
